gaia::core::OnTouchListener Class Reference

 Called when a touch event is dispatched to a widget.

Detailed Description

A callback to be invoked when a touch event is dispatched to this widget.

The callback will be invoked before the touch event is given to the widget.

 class MyTouchListener : public gaia::core::OnTouchListener {
   public:
       MyTouchListener(gaia::core::Page* page);

       virtual bool onTouch(gaia::core::Widget* w, gaia::core::MotionEvent* event) {
           // handle the event here...
       }
       ...
 };

 void MyPage::onInit(Persistence* const p) {
     OnTouchListener* listener = new MyTouchListener(this);
     mpBtn = new Button(this);
     mpBtn->setOnTouchListener(listener);
     ...   
 }

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool gaia::core::OnTouchListener::onTouch ( Widget *  w,
const MotionEvent &  event 
) [virtual]

Called when a touch event is dispatched to a widget.

This allows listeners to get a chance to respond before the target widget.

Parameters:
wThe wdget the touch event has been dispatched to.
eventThe MotionEvent object containing full information about the event.
Returns:
True if the listener has consumed the event, false otherwise.
